title: Question Trump supporters:
body:
CIA claims evidence in hacking that potentially helped Trump win (we know very little so this is pure speculation at best currently)..

And he just appointed Exxon Mobile CEO Rex Tillerson to his sec of state 

Wasn't this why you were so adamently against Hillary? Corruption and money in politics? If the first turns out to be true, and we already know the second is true, what do you have to say? The fact he put in Rex Tillerson should already be disturbing enough but this is probably where you backtrack and say "urh hur argh errrr no no he good man of business our economee will get jobs haha Hillary killary e I e I o"

And as usual, judge him on his own merits now. I don't want to hear shit about Hillary because she wasn't elected (that we know of yet).
